message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Come on, Alice, I deserve a bit more!
Bob, this is the same deal you offered me, only reversed. It's only fair considering the inflation.
Inflation is rising, I need a bigger share!
Bob, let's be real. Inflation is eating our money, another rejection and we'll both be left with peanuts. A 50/50 split is the only logical choice.
